VPR.Q: Which rectangle has the largest area in this treemap?
VPR.A: The rectangle with the largest area is {User Engagement}.

VPR.A: The rectangle with the smallest area is {Likes}.

VE.A: The value of the Reactions and Comments rectangle is {14.92}.

VE.A: The value of the Podcasting rectangle is {22.8}.

VE.Q: What is the value of the Spotify rectangle in this treemap?
VE.A: The value of the Spotify rectangle is {17.01}.

SC.Q: What is the difference between the regions of Sharing and Virality and Likes?
SC.A: The difference between Sharing and Virality and Likes is {18.49}.

SC.Q: What is the sum of the regions of Spotify and Podcasting?
SC.A: The sum of Spotify and Podcasting is {39.81}.

NF.Q: Under the Messaging Apps category in the treemap, which rectangular labels have a value exceeded 10.77? Please list the labels and values.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of User Engagement, Content Creation, or Platforms?
NC.A: The value of {User Engagement} is larger.

NC.Q: Which is smaller, the value of Content Creation, Platforms, or Sharing and Virality?
NC.A: The value of {Sharing and Virality} is smaller.

NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Platforms or Podcasting?
Which is larger, the value of User Engagement or Content Creation?
NC.A: The value of {User Engagement} is larger.
